[[Image:Seal of the United States Supreme Court.svg|150px|right]]
The 2001 term of the [[Supreme Court of the United States]] began October 1, 2001 and concluded October 6, 2002. The table illustrates which opinion was filed by each justice in each case and which justices joined each opinion.<ref>One decree the Court had included in its list of bench opinions for the term has been omitted: ''[[Nebraska v. Wyoming]]'', 534 U.S. 40 (2001), a ''per curiam'' decree approving the parties' settlement.</ref>
